Class DayDataStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • DayDataStatistics

  • public class DayDataStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    26 March 2018 Project 2 Class that stores the max, min, average, of solar radiation and temperature at both 0 and 9 feet from the ground. ass well as total amount of solar radiation recieved
    Author:
    Miguel Barrios Davila

      • calculateSolarRadiationStatistics

        private void calculateSolarRadiationStatistics()
        Compute and fill in the solar radiation-related statistics (solarRadiationMin, solarRadiationMax, solarRadiationAverage, and solarRadiationTotal).

        Notes:

        • Only valid Measurements can be used in these computations
        • You may assume that every month has at least one valid Measurement

      • calculateWindSpeedStatistics

        private void calculateWindSpeedStatistics()
        Compute and fill in the solar radiation-related statistics (solarRadiationMin, solarRadiationMax, solarRadiationAverage, and solarRadiationTotal).

        Notes:

        • Only valid Measurements can be used in these computations
        • You may assume that every month has at least one valid Measurement
